content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, thank you for your interest in our apartment in Duisburg. To begin our discussion, let me start with a proposed rental price of 1200 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiations to find a mutually agreeable figure.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price. I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment because I need more time to evaluate my budget and compare with other options I am considering. I will get back to you soon with a more focused discussion on the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your situation, Farhad. Please take your time to evaluate and compare your options thoroughly. When you are ready to resume our conversation about the rental price, feel free to get in touch with me. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
